shortdesc.ph: Releases a preloaded audio effect file from memory.
Releases a preloaded audio effect file from memory.
Releases a specific preloaded audio effect file from memory.
Releases a preloaded audio effect file from memory.

section.p: After loading an audio effect file into memory using , call this method to release the audio effect file.
After calling to load an audio effect file into memory, call this method to release the file.
After loading the audio effect file into memory using , call this method to release the audio effect file.
After calling to load an audio effect file into memory, you can call this method to release it.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: The ID of the specified audio effect file. Each audio effect file has a unique ID.
The ID of the specified audio effect file. Each audio effect file has a unique ID.
The ID of the specified audio effect file. Each audio effect file has a unique ID.
The ID of the specified audio effect file. Each audio effect file has a unique ID.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
